column3: A - 2  DECADAL VARIATION  IN  POPULATION  SINCE  1901
N.A: The census record of 8 princely States, which were merged into the former PEPSU in 1948, was not available
for the previous decades. In the result it was not possible to build up  comparative figures of four districts
of PEPSU i.e. Kapurthala, Patiala, Sangrur and Bhatinda, for the period from 1901 to 1941
District formed after 2001 census shown in Italics print
